statements: SELECT * FROM international_property_sales;
SELECT transaction_id, buyer_name, seller_name FROM international_property_sales;
SELECT sale_price, sale_date FROM international_property_sales WHERE property_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM international_property_sales ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT buyer_name, sale_price, seller_name FROM international_property_sales WHERE sale_price > 100000 ORDER BY sale_price DESC;
SELECT * FROM international_property_sales WHERE sale_price > 100000 ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT property_id, seller_name FROM international_property_sales WHERE buyer_name='John Doe' AND sale_price < 50000;
SELECT seller_name, buyer_name, sale_date FROM international_property_sales WHERE sale_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_sales, AVG(sale_price) AS average_price FROM international_property_sales GROUP BY seller_name;
SELECT seller_name, MAX(sale_price) AS highest_sale_price FROM international_property_sales GROUP BY seller_name ORDER BY highest_sale_price DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM InternationalPropertySales;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date, transaction_amount FROM InternationalPropertySales;
SELECT buyer_name, seller_name FROM InternationalPropertySales WHERE transaction_amount > 100000;
SELECT property_id, property_address, property_value FROM PropertyDetails WHERE property_type = 'Apartment';
SELECT * FROM InternationalPropertySales WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM InternationalPropertySales WHERE transaction_amount > 100000
SELECT property_id, buyer_name, seller_name, transaction_amount FROM InternationalPropertySales WHERE transaction_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM PropertyDetails WHERE property_type = 'Apartment' ORDER BY property_value DESC
SELECT property_id, property_address FROM PropertyDetails WHERE property_size > 100 ORDER BY property_address
SELECT buyer_name, seller_name, SUM(transaction_amount) AS total_sales FROM InternationalPropertySales GROUP BY buyer_name, seller_name
SELECT * FROM international_property_sales_transactions ORDER BY sale_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT transaction_id, sale_amount, currency FROM international_property_sales_transactions WHERE sale_amount > 100000 ORDER BY sale_amount DESC;

SELECT buyer_name, seller_name, property_address FROM international_property_sales_transactions JOIN property_details ON international_property_sales_transactions.property_id = property_details.property_id;
SELECT action, action_date FROM transaction_history WHERE action_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT property_type, AVG(property_price) AS average_price FROM property_details GROUP BY property_type;
SELECT * FROM international_property_sales_transactions;
SELECT property_id, property_address, property_price FROM property_details WHERE property_type = 'apartment';
SELECT transaction_id, buyer_name, seller_name, sale_date FROM international_property_sales_transactions WHERE sale_amount > 1000000;
SELECT action, action_date, performed_by FROM transaction_history ORDER BY action_date DESC;

SELECT t1.transaction_id, t1.sale_amount, t2.property_address, t3.action FROM international_property_sales_transactions t1 JOIN property_details t2 ON t1.property_id = t2.property_id JOIN transaction_history t3 ON t1.transaction_id = t3.transaction_id WHERE t1.sale_amount > 500000 AND t3.action = 'SOLD' ORDER BY t1.sale_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM international_property_sales ORDER BY property_id DESC;
SELECT property_name, property_location, seller_name FROM international_property_sales WHERE seller_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT buyer_name, transaction_date FROM international_property_sales WHERE buyer_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT property_name, property_location, seller_name, buyer_name FROM international_property_sales WHERE transaction_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM property_agents ORDER BY agent_name;
SELECT * FROM international_property_sales WHERE transaction_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT prop.property_name, img.image_url FROM international_property_sales prop INNER JOIN property_images img ON prop.property_id = img.property_id;

SELECT prop.property_id, tran.transaction_amount, tran.transaction_type FROM international_property_sales prop INNER JOIN property_transactions tran ON prop.property_id = tran.property_id WHERE tran.transaction_amount > 100000;

SELECT prop.property_name, tran.transaction_amount, ag.agent_name FROM international_property_sales prop JOIN property_transactions tran ON prop.property_id = tran.property_id JOIN property_agents ag ON tran.transaction_id = ag.agent_id WHERE ag.contact_number LIKE '%123%';

SELECT prop.property_id, COUNT(*) AS num_transactions FROM international_property_sales prop JOIN property_transactions tran ON prop.property_id = tran.property_id GROUP BY prop.property_id HAVING num_transactions > 2;
SELECT * FROM International_Property_Sales;
SELECT transaction_id, sale_amount, sale_date FROM International_Property_Sales WHERE sale_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT buyer_name, seller_name, sale_amount FROM International_Property_Sales ORDER BY sale_amount DESC;
SELECT t.* FROM Transaction_History t INNER JOIN Buyers b ON t.buyer_id = b.buyer_id WHERE b.buyer_country = 'USA';
SELECT s.seller_name, p.property_location, p.property_type FROM Sellers s INNER JOIN Property_Details p ON s.seller_id = p.property_id;
SELECT * FROM International_Property_Sales WHERE sale_amount > 50000;
SELECT property_id, property_type, property_location FROM Property_Details WHERE property_value > 100000;
SELECT buyer_name, seller_name, sale_date FROM International_Property_Sales ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT seller_name, seller_country FROM Sellers WHERE seller_country = 'USA';
SELECT buyer_name, buyer_country FROM Buyers WHERE buyer_country != 'Canada';
